description:
An Abandoned School where children used to study and teachers used to work, has become a local nightmare for local residents, every local resident knows that you canâ€™t visit this place and even approach it, strange things happened there in the past and to this day, everyone who approaches the school has disappeared unknown, but one day there was one brave man who decided to find out the truth and for his constantly tormenting nightmares.
Features:
Realistic graphics
Variety of mechanics
Mysterious story
Location in the form of an abandoned school
From 5 different bosses with different stories
Various screamers
Various tools for passing the game
Puzzle
Excellent soundtrack.

Immerse yourself in the shoes of an ordinary resident of the town with your story and find out the truth about the most mysterious school.
name: Story of Abandoned School - Silent Escape Horror
